title: The Federal Reserve�s Review of Its Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and Communication Practices
content: For release on delivery  Noon EST  February 22, 2019      The Federal Reserve’s Review of Its Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and  Communication Practices    Remarks by     Richard H. Clarida     Vice Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     2019 U.S. Monetary Policy Forum, sponsored by  the Initiative on Global Markets at the University of Chicago Booth School of Business     New York, New York    February 22, 2019
